creditline: Gift of the Mary Sully Foundation
dimension:
34 3/4 × 19 in. (88.3 × 48.3 cm)
12 1/16 × 18 15/16 in. (30.6 × 48.1 cm) (object part, top sheet)
12 1/16 × 18 15/16 in. (30.6 × 48.1 cm) (object part, middle sheet)
9 1/2 × 12 in. (24.1 × 30.5 cm) (object part, bottom sheet)
inscription: on back of bottom sheet and on back of center sheet in pencil: 13 | on back of bottom sheet in pencil: 5 (circled)
signed: on back of bottom sheet and on back of center sheet in pencil: Anton Lang
text: Top sheet has two convex arcs between a concave arc with white road-like element at center in muted tones of black, grey, and white. The center sheet has horizontal rows of repeating patterns of half-circles with white cone-shaped element at center and curving forms in black, grey, and white. The bottom sheet has central medallion of grey and white feathers with blue, red, and grey radiating element at center; similar round elements in each corners with brown curving "tassel" with red, yellow, blue, and black bands and red element at ends.
title: Anton Lang
